nullToEmpty, endSecteurFictifs join(replace({ATC offre}, " ", "") == replace(NoATC, " ", ""),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> atcOffreINNER
baseCommerciale, endSecteurFictifs join(replace({ATC offre}, " ", "") == replace(NoATC, " ", ""),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> atcOffreFULLLEFT
DerivedColumn1 filter(isNull(NoATC)) ~> atcOffreOUTERLEFT
atcOffreINNER derive({ATC fictif offre} = 1) ~> updateATCOffre
baseCommerciale derive({ATC offre} = iif(isNull({ATC offre}), "", {ATC offre}),
		{ATC Corrigé (vente directe)} = iif(isNull({ATC Corrigé (vente directe)}), "", {ATC Corrigé (vente directe)})) ~> nullToEmpty
updateATCOffre, atcOffreOUTERLEFT union(byName: true)~> atcOffreTraite
deleteSecteurColumn, endSecteurFictifs join(replace({ATC Corrigé (vente directe)}, " ", "") == replace(NoATC, " ", ""),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> atcCorrigeINNER
deleteSecteurColumn, endSecteurFictifs join(replace({ATC Corrigé (vente directe)}, " ", "") == replace(NoATC, " ", ""),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> atcCorrigeFULLLEFT
atcCorrigeFULLLEFT filter(isNull(NoATC)) ~> atcCorrigeOUTERLEFT

filtreListePOS derive(ToDelete = iif( !isNull(Canal) && Canal=={nom du canal} , 1, 0)) ~> toDelete2
toDelete2 filter(ToDelete==0) ~> filtreCanal
filtreCanal filter(instr(lower({Type de seuil}),"ca")>0) ~> CA
CA aggregate(groupBy({ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		year),
	ca = sum(toDouble(ca)),
		{Réalisé} = sum(toDouble(ca))) ~> uniqueForCA
filtreCanal filter(instr(lower({Type de seuil}),"ca")==0) ~> quantite
quantite aggregate(groupBy({ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		year),
	{Somme quantité} = sum(toInteger(quantite)),
		{Réalisé} = sum(toInteger(quantite))) ~> uniqueForQuantity
uniqueForCA, uniqueForQuantity union(byName: true)~> UnionCAQuantity
baseCommerciale derive(ca = replace(ca, ",", ".")) ~> DerivedColumn1
filtreMarque derive(betweenDate = between(toDate(year+"-"+substring(yearmonth, 5, 2)+"-01"), {Date de début}, {Date de fin})) ~> verificationDateDebutDateFin
verificationDateDebutDateFin filter(betweenDate==true()) ~> filtreDate
innerBaseCommerciale filter(lower(replace(FlattenPOS@Marque," ","")) == lower(replace(baseColumnChoice@marque," ",""))) ~> filtreMarque
baseColumnChoice filter({Code client livré}=="16000761" || {Code client livré}=="16000475" || {Code client livré}=="") ~> filter1
filter1 filter(year=="2021" && {nom du canal} != "FC" && marque=="Vaillant") ~> filter2
filter2 aggregate(groupBy(year),
	ca = sum(toDouble(ca))) ~> aggregate1
article filter(!isNull({Hiérarch.locale})) ~> hierarchieLocaleNonVide
hierarchieLocaleNonVide derive(Article = coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))) ~> coalesceArticle
UnionCAQuantity sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Article as string,
		NoCanalDist as string,
		NoArt as string,
		NoNiv1 as string,
		NoNiv2 as string,
		NoNiv3 as string,
		NoNiv4 as string,
		NoNiv5 as string,
		NoNiv6 as string,
		NoNiv7 as string,
		Niv1 as string,
		Niv2 as string,
		Niv3 as string,
		Niv4 as string,
		Niv6 as string,
		Niv7 as string,
		CanalDist as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['CALCUL_REMUNERATION.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CALCULREMUNERATION

contratCadre, contrat join(contratCadre@{ID contrat cadre} == contrat@{ID contrat cadre},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinContrat
joinContrat select(mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre} = contratCadre@{ID contrat cadre},
		Leviers,
		{ID contrat} = {ID contrat (unique)},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC référents du contrat (pour la visualisation)}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniqueColumnContrat
uniqueColumnContrat, levier join(Leviers == {ID levier},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerContratLevier
innerContratLevier select(mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC référents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		{ID levier},
		code_produit = {Code produit},
		{Code produits exclus},
		famille_produit = {Famille produit},
		{Famille produit exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de début},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniqueColumnLevier
uniqueColumnLevier derive(Canal = replace(replace(Canal, " ", ""), "<>", "")) ~> canal
canal aggregate(groupBy({ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier}),
	{Liste des POS participants} = max({Liste des POS participants}),
		{Liste des ATC référents du contrat (pour la visualisation)} = max({Liste des ATC référents du contrat (pour la visualisation)}),
		code_produit = max(code_produit),
		{Code produits exclus} = max({Code produits exclus}),
		{Famille produit} = max(famille_produit),
		{Famille produit exclus} = max({Famille produit exclus}),
		Canal = max(Canal),
		{Date de début} = max({Date de début}),
		{Date de fin} = max({Date de fin}),
		{Type de seuil} = max({Type de seuil}),
		{ID seuil} = max({ID seuil}),
		Marque = max(Marque)) ~> uniqueIDContrat
getArticleList derive(code_produit = split(code_produit, ";"),
		{Code produits exclus} = split({Code produits exclus}, ";")) ~> codeProduitToList
dropArticleList foldDown(unroll(code_produit),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC référents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		Code_produits_exclus,
		{Famille produit},
		{Famille produit exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de début},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenCodeProduit
name aggregate(groupBy(name),
	article_list = collect(Article)) ~> articleToLIst
deleteSpace aggregate(groupBy(Article),
	hierarchieLocale = first({Hiérarch.locale})) ~> uniqueReferenceArticle
uniqueReferenceArticle derive(name = "tous") ~> name
uniqueIDContrat, articleToLIst join(lower(code_produit) == lower(name),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> getArticleList
codeProduitToList derive(code_produit = iif(lower(code_produit[1])=="tous", article_list, code_produit)) ~> newCodeProduit
newCodeProduit select(mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC référents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		Code_produits_exclus = {Code produits exclus},
		{Famille produit},
		{Famille produit exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de début},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		name,
		code_produit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropArticleList
FlattenCodeProduit foldDown(unroll(Code_produits_exclus),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC référents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus} = Code_produits_exclus,
		{Famille produit},
		{Famille produit exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de début},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenCodeProduitExclu
FlattenCodeProduitExclu derive(ToDelete = iif(code_produit=={Code produits exclus}, 1, 0)) ~> toDeleteCode
toDeleteCode filter(ToDelete!=1) ~> deleteCodeProduitExclu
deleteCodeProduitExclu derive(Famille_produit = split({Famille produit}, ";"),
		Famille_produit_exclus = split({Famille produit exclus}, ";")) ~> familleProduitToList
familleProduitToList foldDown(unroll(Famille_produit),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC référents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de début},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		ToDelete,
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenFamille
FlattenFamille foldDown(unroll(Famille_produit_exclus),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC référents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de début},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		ToDelete,
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenFamilleExclu
getHierarchieLocale filter(lower(Famille_produit)=="toutes") ~> touteFamille
touteFamille derive(ToDelete = iif(substring(hierarchieLocale,1,length(Famille_produit_exclus))==Famille_produit_exclus,1,0)) ~> touteFamilleToDelete
touteFamilleToDelete filter(ToDelete==0) ~> toKeep1
getHierarchieLocale filter(lower(Famille_produit)!="toutes") ~> pasTouteFamille
pasTouteFamille derive(ToDelete = iif(substring(hierarchieLocale,1,length(Famille_produit))!=Famille_produit || Famille_produit==Famille_produit_exclus,1,0)) ~> pasTouteFamilleToDelete
pasTouteFamilleToDelete filter(ToDelete==0) ~> toKeep
toKeep1, toKeep union(byName: true)~> UniontoKeep
UniontoKeep derive(Canal = split(Canal, ";"),
		Liste_des_POS_participants = split({Liste des POS participants}, ";")) ~> canalToList
canalToList foldDown(unroll(Canal),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		Liste_des_POS_participants,
		{Liste des ATC référents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de début},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		ToDelete,
		Article,
		{Hiérarch.locale} = hierarchieLocale,
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenCanal
FlattenCanal foldDown(unroll(Liste_des_POS_participants),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants} = Liste_des_POS_participants,
		{Liste des ATC référents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de début},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		ToDelete,
		Article,
		{Hiérarch.locale},
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenPOS
coalesceArticle, baseColumnChoice join(coalesce(toString(toInteger(Article)),Article) == coalesce(toString(toInteger({code produit})),{code produit}),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerBaseCommerciale
filtreDate select(mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC référents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de début},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque = FlattenPOS@Marque,
		ToDelete,
		Article,
		locale = {Hiérarch.locale},
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus,
		year,
		{Code client livré},
		quantite,
		ca,
		{nom du canal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoice
DerivedColumn3 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		{Code client livré},
		{code produit},
		quantite,
		ca,
		{nom du canal},
		marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> baseColumnChoice
columnChoice derive(ToDelete = iif({Liste des POS participants}=="" || {Liste des POS participants}=={Code client livré}, 0, 1)) ~> toDelete
toDelete filter(ToDelete==0) ~> filtreListePOS
filtreListePOS derive(ToDelete = iif( !isNull(Canal) && Canal=={nom du canal} , 1, 0)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 filter(ToDelete==0) ~> filtreCanal
filtreCanal filter(instr(lower({Type de seuil}),"ca")>0) ~> CA
CA aggregate(groupBy({ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		year),
	ca = sum(toDouble(ca)),
		{Réalisé} = sum(toDouble(ca))) ~> uniqueForCA
filtreCanal filter(instr(lower({Type de seuil}),"ca")==0) ~> quantite
quantite aggregate(groupBy({ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		year),
	{Somme quantité} = sum(toInteger(quantite)),
		{Réalisé} = sum(toInteger(quantite))) ~> uniqueForQuantity
uniqueForCA, uniqueForQuantity union(byName: true)~> UnionCAQuantity
UnionCAQuantity, templateContrat join(UnionCAQuantity@{ID contrat cadre} == templateContrat@{ID contrat cadre}
	&& UnionCAQuantity@{ID contrat} == templateContrat@{ID contrat}
	&& UnionCAQuantity@{ID levier} == templateContrat@{ID levier},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerTemplateContrat
innerTemplateContrat select(mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre} = UnionCAQuantity@{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat} = UnionCAQuantity@{ID contrat},
		{ID levier} = UnionCAQuantity@{ID levier},
		year,
		ca,
		{Réalisé},
		{Somme quantité},
		{ID Seuil},
		{Objectif (avec règles de validation)}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
dropColumns filter({Réalisé}>=toDouble({Objectif (avec règles de validation)})) ~> Realise
Realise aggregate(groupBy(year,
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier}),
	{Max ID Seuil} = max(toInteger({ID Seuil}))) ~> unique
unique, calculRem join(unique@{ID levier} == calculRem@{ID levier}
	&& toInteger({Max ID Seuil}) == toInteger({ID seuil}),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerTemplateRemuneration
innerTemplateRemuneration select(mapColumn(
		year,
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier} = unique@{ID levier},
		{Max ID Seuil},
		{Contrepartie seuil}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon
baseCommerciale derive(ca = replace(ca, ",", "."),
		{code produit} = replace({code produit}, " ", "")) ~> DerivedColumn3
dropColumnsInCommon, addAllYear join(dropColumnsInCommon@{ID contrat cadre} == dropArticleList@{ID contrat cadre}
	&& dropColumnsInCommon@{ID contrat} == dropArticleList@{ID contrat}
	&& dropColumnsInCommon@{ID levier} == dropArticleList@{ID levier}
	&& dropColumnsInCommon@year == uniqueYear@year,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		{Max ID Seuil},
		{Contrepartie seuil},
		{ID contrat cadre} = dropArticleList@{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat} = dropArticleList@{ID contrat},
		{ID levier} = dropArticleList@{ID levier},
		year = uniqueYear@year
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
dropColumnsInCommon aggregate(groupBy(year),
	join = max({ID contrat cadre})) ~> uniqueYear
uniqueYear derive(join = 1) ~> columnToJoin
dropArticleList derive(join = 1) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn4, columnToJoin join(DerivedColumn4@join == columnToJoin@join,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> addAllYear

article filter(!isNull({Hiérarch.locale})) ~> hierarchieNull

hierarchieNull derive(Article = coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))) ~> deleteSpace

deleteCodeProduitExclu derive(code_produit = coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({code_produit}, " ", ""))),replace({code_produit}, " ", ""))) ~> derive

getArticleList derive(code_produit = split(code_produit, ";"),

dropArticleList foldDown(unroll(code_produit),

deleteSpace aggregate(groupBy(Article),

uniqueReferenceArticle derive(name = "tous") ~> name

codeProduitToList derive(code_produit = iif(lower(code_produit[1])=="tous", article_list, code_produit)) ~> newCodeProduit

toDeleteCode filter(ToDelete!=1) ~> deleteCodeProduitExclu
deleteCodeProduitExclu, uniqueReferenceArticle join(coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(code_produit, " ", ""))),replace(code_produit, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", "")),

		Famille_produit_exclus = split({Famille produit exclus}, ";")) ~> familleProduitToList

		{Liste des ATC référents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},

		{Date de début},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		{Seuil min},
		ToDelete,
		Article,
		{Hiérarch.locale} = hierarchieLocale,
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,

	mapColumn(

		{Liste des ATC référents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de début},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		{Seuil min},
		ToDelete,
		Article,
		{Hiérarch.locale},
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenFamilleExclu
FlattenFamilleExclu filter(lower(Famille_produit)=="toutes") ~> touteFamille
touteFamille derive(ToDelete = iif(substring({Hiérarch.locale},1,length(Famille_produit_exclus))==Famille_produit_exclus,1,0)) ~> touteFamilleToDelete
touteFamilleToDelete filter(ToDelete==0) ~> toKeep1
FlattenFamilleExclu filter(lower(Famille_produit)!="toutes") ~> pasTouteFamille
pasTouteFamille derive(ToDelete = iif(substring({Hiérarch.locale},1,length(Famille_produit))!=Famille_produit || Famille_produit==Famille_produit_exclus,1,0)) ~> pasTouteFamilleToDelete
pasTouteFamilleToDelete filter(ToDelete==0) ~> toKeep
toKeep1, toKeep union(byName: true)~> UniontoKeep
UniontoKeep derive(Canal = split(Canal, ";"),
		Liste_des_POS_participants = split({Liste des POS participants}, ";")) ~> canalToList
canalToList foldDown(unroll(Canal),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		Liste_des_POS_participants,
		{Liste des ATC référents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de début},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		{Seuil min},
		ToDelete,
		Article,
		{Hiérarch.locale},
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenCanal
FlattenCanal foldDown(unroll(Liste_des_POS_participants),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants} = Liste_des_POS_participants,
		{Liste des ATC référents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de début},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		{Seuil min},
		ToDelete,
		Article,
		{Hiérarch.locale},
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenPOS
coalesceArticle, baseColumnChoice join(coalesce(toString(toInteger(Article)),Article) == coalesce(toString(toInteger({code produit})),{code produit}),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerBaseCommerciale
filtreDate select(mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC référents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de début},
		{Date de fin},

		{ID seuil},

		ca,
		{nom du canal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoice
DerivedColumn3 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		{Code client livré},
		{code produit},
		quantite,
		ca,
		{nom du canal},
		marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> baseColumnChoice

toDelete filter(ToDelete==0) ~> filtreListePOS
filtreListePOS derive(ToDelete = iif( !isNull(Canal) && Canal=={nom du canal} , 1, 0)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 filter(ToDelete==0) ~> filtreCanal
filtreCanal filter(instr(lower({Type de seuil}),"ca")>0) ~> CA
CA aggregate(groupBy({ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		year),
	ca = sum(toDouble(ca)),
		{Réalisé} = sum(toDouble(ca)),
		{Seuil min} = min({Seuil min})) ~> uniqueForCA
filtreCanal filter(instr(lower({Type de seuil}),"ca")==0) ~> quantite
quantite aggregate(groupBy({ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		year),
	{Somme quantité} = sum(toInteger(quantite)),
		{Réalisé} = sum(toInteger(quantite)),
		{Seuil min} = min({Seuil min})) ~> uniqueForQuantity
uniqueForCA, uniqueForQuantity union(byName: true)~> UnionCAQuantity
UnionCAQuantity, templateContrat join(UnionCAQuantity@{ID contrat cadre} == templateContrat@{ID contrat cadre}
	&& UnionCAQuantity@{ID contrat} == templateContrat@{ID contrat}
	&& UnionCAQuantity@{ID levier} == templateContrat@{ID levier},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerTemplateContrat
innerTemplateContrat select(mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre} = UnionCAQuantity@{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat} = UnionCAQuantity@{ID contrat},
		{ID levier} = UnionCAQuantity@{ID levier},
		year,
		ca,
		{Réalisé},
		{Somme quantité},
		{ID Seuil},
		{Objectif (avec règles de validation)},
		{Seuil min}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
dropColumns filter({Réalisé}>=toDouble({Objectif (avec règles de validation)}) && {Réalisé}>={Seuil min}) ~> Realise

		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier}),
	{Max ID Seuil} = max(toInteger({ID Seuil}))) ~> unique
unique, calculRem join(unique@{ID levier} == calculRem@{ID levier}
	&& toInteger({Max ID Seuil}) == toInteger({ID seuil}),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerTemplateRemuneration
innerTemplateRemuneration select(mapColumn(
		year,
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},

	&& dropColumnsInCommon@year == uniqueYear@year,

		reference = unionEccoulement@reference,
		{Code postal},
		distributeur,
		marque_file,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,
		marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select2 derive({code postal} = iif( !isNull({Sap_Code postal}) , {Sap_Code postal} , Ecc_Code_postal),
		marque_name = iif(marque=="1604",  "SaunierDuval", "Vaillant"),
		distributeur = upper(distributeur)) ~> setPostalCode
Select5 derive(month = toInteger(mois1)+ toInteger(order),
		Distributeur = lower(Distributeur)) ~> DerivedColumn2
Aggregate1 derive(distributeur = iif(  instr(Distributeur ,'sonac' ) >0 , upper('mabille') , upper(Distributeur)  )) ~> pricelisteTojoin
setPostalCode, pricelisteTojoin join(upper(setPostalCode@distributeur) == upper(pricelisteTojoin@distributeur)
	&& toDouble(Select2@month) == toDouble(Aggregate1@month)
	&& toDouble(year) == toDouble(annee1)
	&& toDouble(reference) == toDouble(Article),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join3 derive(ca_ecoulement = iif( !isNull(prix_unitaire) , prix_unitaire, "0" )) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn3 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month = Select2@month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur = setPostalCode@distributeur,
		marque_file,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,
		marque,
		Client,
		{code postal},
		marque_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
pricelisteReplicated select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		Distributeur,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		{Période},
		{Mois début},
		{Mois fin},
		mois1,
		annee1,
		mois2,
		annee2,
		order = dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
DerivedColumn2 aggregate(groupBy(Distributeur,
		Article,
		month,
		annee1),
	prix_unitaire = max(prix_unitaire)) ~> Aggregate1
setPostalCode filter(upper(distributeur)==upper('MAILLARD')) ~> Filter1
pricelisteTojoin filter(upper(pricelisteTojoin@distributeur)=="MAILLARD") ~> Filter2
Filter1, Filter2 join(upper(setPostalCode@distributeur) == upper(pricelisteTojoin@distributeur)
	&& toInteger(reference) == toInteger(Article)
	&& year == annee1
	&& toDouble(Select2@month) == toDouble(Aggregate1@month),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join4
Filter2 filter(toInteger(Article)==toInteger("0020082651")) ~> Filter3
EPS select(mapColumn(
		Client = {Numéro du compte},
		Nom = {Nom du compte},
		{Code postal } = {Code postal},
		Ville
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endEPS
EHS select(mapColumn(
		Client,
		{Code postal } = {Code Postal},
		Nom
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endEHS
endEHS, endEPS union(byName: true)~> Union1
DerivedColumn4 aggregate(groupBy(Client,
		{Code postal },
		Nom,
		Ville),
	temp = sum(temp)) ~> Aggregate2
Union1 derive(temp = 1,
		Client = toString(toInteger(Client))) ~> DerivedColumn4
Aggregate2 select(mapColumn(
		Client,
		{client Code postal } = {Code postal },
		Nom,
		Ville
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endEhsEPS
derivedColumn1s, addIdentifier join(coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(unionEccoulement@reference, " ", ""))),replace(unionEccoulement@reference, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(articlDropdupl@reference, " ", ""))),replace(articlDropdupl@reference, " ", ""))
	&& toString(marque_id) == marque,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftarticle
articlDropdupl derive(torigin = "article") ~> addIdentifier
leftarticle filter(isNull(torigin)) ~> fnullarticle
DerivedColumn1 derive(nexcola = iif (  instr(lower(marque_file) , "saunier") >0  , 1604 , 1621 )) ~> derivedColumn1s
Select4 filter(toDouble(qte_ecoulement)!=0) ~> qte0

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Société} as string,
		{Dépot} as string,
		Mois as string,
		{Code GTAC} as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		{Désignation} as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		Valeur as string,
		{Quantité n-1} as string,
		{Valeur n-1} as string,
		{CP Dépôt} as string,
		Dummy as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'fname',
	wildcardPaths:['Ecoulement/Maillard/*.csv']) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		{Nom Agence (Code)} as string,
		{CP Agence} as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		year as string,
		reference as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
select1 filter(!isNull({Quantité})) ~> quantityNotNull
quantityNotNull derive(Year = split(Mois, "/")[2],
		Month = split(Mois, "/")[1]) ~> getYear
getYear derive(Yearmonth = concat(Year, Month)) ~> yearMonth
yearMonth filter(!isNull({Dépot})) ~> depotNotNull
organisation derive({Nom Agence (Code)} = trim({Nom Agence (Code)}, " "),
		HubSAPid = trim({HubSAPid}, " ")) ~> cleansing
cleansing filter(!isNull({Nom Agence (Code)})) ~> notNull
notNull aggregate(groupBy({Nom Agence (Code)},
		HubSAPid),
	{CP Agence} = max({CP Agence}),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		BrandID = max(BrandID)) ~> uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID
depotNotNull, uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID join({Dépot} == {Nom Agence (Code)},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
depotNotNull, uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID join({Dépot} == {Nom Agence (Code)},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull({Nom Agence (Code)})) ~> outerleftOrganisation
ventesDirectes derive({Code client} = trim({Code client}, " "),
		{Qté facturée} = toDouble(qte_ecoulement),
		year = trim(year, " "),
		Article = trim(reference, " ")) ~> cleansingVentesDirectes
cleansingVentesDirectes aggregate(groupBy(year,
		Article,
		{Code client}),
	{Qté facturée} = sum({Qté facturée})) ~> sumQuantity
window1, typeCaste join(getYear@Year == typeCaste@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Référence}, " ", ""))),replace({Référence}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
Rename derive(year = toString(year),
		Article = toString(Article),
		{Code client} = toString({Code client})) ~> typeCaste
yearmonthSplit, typeCaste join(getYear@Year == typeCaste@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Référence}, " ", ""))),replace({Référence}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(typeCaste@year) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client})) ~> outerleftVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive(ecart = runingQte-{Qté ventes directes},
		signe = iif(toDouble(runingQte)-toDouble({Qté ventes directes}) <=0 , 0, 1)) ~> enleverVentesDirectes
sumQuantity select(mapColumn(
		year,
		Article,
		{Code client},
		{Qté ventes directes} = {Qté facturée}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Rename
derivedColumn1, outerleftVentesDirectes union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion
fullLeftUnion derive(marque_file = iif(toInteger(BrandID)==1604, "saunier", "vaillant"),
		{Société} = upper({Société})) ~> marqueFile
marqueFile select(mapColumn(
		distributeur = {Société},
		reference = {Référence},
		article = {Désignation},
		qte_ecoulement = {Quantité},
		ca_ecoulement = Valeur,
		{Code postal} = {CP Dépôt},
		year = fullLeftUnion@Year,
		month = Month,
		yearmonth = Yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMid,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		marque_file,
		agence_code = {Dépot}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
innerOrganisation derive(Yearmonth = replace(Yearmonth, " ", "")) ~> yearmonthSplit
yearmonthSplit window(over(Year,
		POSSAMid,
		{Référence}),
	asc(Mois, true),
	runingQte = sum({Quantité})) ~> window1
select2 select(mapColumn(
		{Société},
		{Dépot},
		Mois,
		{Code GTAC},
		{Référence},
		{Désignation},
		{Quantité},
		Valeur,
		{Quantité n-1},
		{Valeur n-1},
		{CP Dépôt},
		fname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
MapDrifted2 select(mapColumn(
		{Société} = Societe,
		{Dépot} = Dept,
		Mois,
		{Code GTAC},
		{Référence} = Reference,
		{Désignation},
		{Quantité} = Qte,
		Valeur,
		{Quantité n-1},
		{Valeur n-1},
		{CP Dépôt},
		Dummy,
		fname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select2
ecoulement derive(Societe = toString(byName('SociÃ©tÃ©')),
		Dept = toString(byName('DÃ©pot')),
		Reference = toString(byName('RÃ©fÃ©rence')),
		Designation = toString(byName('DÃ©signation')),
		Qte = toShort(byName('QuantitÃ©'))) ~> MapDrifted2
enleverVentesDirectes window(over(getYear@Year,
		{Référence},
		POSSAMid),
	asc(Mois, true),
	signe_cumul = sum(signe)) ~> window2
window2 derive({Quantité} = iif( signe_cumul <1,0, iif (signe_cumul ==1 , toInteger(ecart), toInteger( {Quantité})   ) )) ~> derivedColumn1
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{SaunierDuvalNicolas HERNANDEZ0100001999Conseiller Technique Thermodynamique0} as string,
		{SaunierDuvalNicolas HERNANDEZ0100001999Conseiller Technique Thermodynamique1} as string,
		SaunierDuval as string,
		{01000} as string,
		{01999} as string,
		{nicolas hernandez} as string,
		{Conseiller Technique Thermodynamique} as string,
		{01} as string,
		{1647-Rhône-Alpes Auvergne} as string,
		{16400092} as string,
		{nicolas julien} as string,
		{SD diffus} as string,
		{NICOLAS Julien} as string,
		{16566798} as string,
		Prop_14 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['MAILLARD_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MAILLARDECOULPREPARED
outerleftOrganisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MAILLARD_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> organisationNotFound

		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
fillNaRefFournisseur derive(month = iif(lower(Mois)=="janvier", "01",      iif(lower(Mois)=="février","02",     iif(lower(Mois)=="mars", "03",      iif(lower(Mois)=="avril", "04",      iif(lower(Mois)=="mai", "05",      iif(lower(Mois)=="juin", "06",      iif(lower(Mois)=="juillet", "07",      iif(lower(Mois)=="août", "08",      iif(lower(Mois)=="septembre", "09",      iif(lower(Mois)=="octobre", "10",      iif(lower(Mois)=="novembre", "11",      iif(lower(Mois)=="décembre", "12", "0")))))))))))),
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> monthToNumber
yearmonth filter(!isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNotNull
monthToNumber filter(isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNull
quantityNotNull filter(!isNull({Coopérative})) ~> cooperativenotNull
organisation filter(!isNull({Nom Coopérative})) ~> orgaCooperativeNotNull
orgaCooperativeNotNull aggregate(groupBy({Nom Coopérative},
		HubSAPid),
	POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid)) ~> unique
cooperativenotNull, unique join({Coopérative} == {Nom Coopérative},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
cooperativenotNull, unique join({Coopérative} == {Nom Coopérative},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull({Nom Coopérative})) ~> leftOuter
monthToNumber derive(yearmonth = year+month,
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonth
innerOrganisation derive(marque_id = iif(lower(marque_file)=="vaillant", 1621, 1604)) ~> typeCaste
typeCaste select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		reference = {Référence},
		article = {Désignation},
		qte_ecoulement,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMid,
		marque_id,
		agence_code = {Coopérative}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		marque_file = Fournisseur,
		{Coopérative},
		{Référence},
		{Désignation},
		Mois,
		path,
		qte_ecoulement,
		REFFOURNISSEUR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoice
columnChoice derive(year = regexExtract(path, "(\\d+)", 1)) ~> getYear
ecoulement derive({Référence} = coalesce(REFFOURNISSEUR,{Référence})) ~> DerivedColumn1
getYear derive({Référence} = coalesce({Référence},REFFOURNISSEUR)) ~> fillNaRefFournisseur

	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,

		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['ORCAB_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ORCABECOULPREPARED
quantityNull sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ORCAB_QTE_NULL.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> quantityNullOutput

	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ORCAB_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> organisationNotFound

	),

		id = idDecrementation,
		PossAMid = POSSAMidString,

		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement = {Qté Livré Mois A},

	),
	composition: 'decrementationVenteDirecte') ~> flowlet1@(output1)
ecoulement select(mapColumn(
		Marque_file = {Nom Fournisseur Principal},
		Clients,
		{Code Agence},
		{Libellé Agence},
		{Code postal agence},
		{Ag Siret},
		Siren,
		MKT1,
		MKT2,
		MKT3,
		Reference = {Reference Fournisseur},
		Libelle,
		{Qté Livré Mois A},
		{Qté Livré Mois A-1},

		{Qté Livré Cumul A-1},

		{VVA CUMUL EXERCICE N-1},
		path
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoice
columnChoice derive({Qté Livré Mois A} = toInteger({Qté Livré Mois A}),
		yearmonth = trim(replace(split(path, "-")[3], ".xlsx", ""), " ")) ~> typeCaste
organisation filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posIdNotNull
posIdNotNull aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID)) ~> unique
typeCaste, unique join({Code Agence} == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerJoin
typeCaste, unique join({Code Agence} == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LeftJoin
LeftJoin filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> Outer
cleansingVenteDirecte aggregate(groupBy(year_right,
		Article,
		{Code client}),
	{Qté ventes directes} = sum({Qté ventes directes})) ~> uniqueKey
venteDirecte derive({Qté ventes directes} = toDouble(qte_ecoulement),
		year_right = replace({year}, " ", ""),
		Article = replace(reference, " ", ""),
		{Code client} = replace({Code client}, " ", "")) ~> cleansingVenteDirecte
cleansingEcoulement, uniqueKey join(year == year_right
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Reference, " ", ""))),replace(Reference, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> eccoulementVenteDirecteLeftJoin
extract derive(Reference = replace(Reference," ",""),
		POSSAMidString = replace(POSSAMidString," ","")) ~> cleansingEcoulement
cleansingEcoulement, uniqueKey join(year == year_right
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Reference, " ", ""))),replace(Reference, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ecoulementVenteDirecteInnerJoin
ecoulementVenteDirecteInnerJoin filter(isNull(year_right) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client})) ~> leftOuter
join1 derive({Qté Livré Mois A} = qt_final) ~> enleverQuantiteVenteDirecte
enleverQuantiteVenteDirecte, leftOuter union(byName: true)~> fullLeft
fullLeft select(mapColumn(
		Marque_file,
		Clients,
		{Code Agence},
		{Libellé Agence},

		{Ag Siret},
		Siren,

		POSid,

		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon

		month = substring(yearmonth, 5, 2)) ~> exctractYear

prixParPeriode derive({Période} = iif(length({Période})>1,{Période},"0"+{Période})) ~> periode
derivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(reference),
	Nombre = count(reference),
		CA = sum({CA facturé}),
		{Qté} = sum({Qté facturée})) ~> aggregate1

filter2 derive(reference = coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(reference, " ", ""))),replace(reference, " ", ""))) ~> derivedColumn1

AllFacturation derive(year = toString(year({Jour calendaire})),
		yearmonth = iif(month({Jour calendaire})<10, toString(year({Jour calendaire}))+"0"+toString(month({Jour calendaire})), toString(year({Jour calendaire}))+toString(month({Jour calendaire}))),
		date_id = toString({Jour calendaire}, "dd-MM-yyyy"),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> extractYearMonth
extractYearMonth derive(fact_filter = iif ( ({Type de facture} =='YFAR' && ({Motif commande}=='FAS')  ||  ( {Type de facture}=='YFAB' && {Motif commande}=='FAS' )) ,1,0)) ~> FactFilterc
FactFilterc derive(qt_cd_e = {Qté cdée},
		ca_cd_ = {CA cdé},
		qt_livr_e = {Qté livrée},
		ca_livr_ = {CA livré},
		qt_factur_e = {Qté facturée},
		ca_factur_ = {CA facturé},
		cout_standard_cd_ = {Cout standard cdé},
		cout_fabrication = {Cout fabrication},
		cout_standard_livr_ = {Cout standard livré},
		cout_standard_factur_ = {Cout standard facturé}) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn derive(year_month = substring(date_id,1,6)) ~> extractYearMonthc
extractYearMonthc filter(fact_filter==0 || !isNull(Article)) ~> FactFilter
PLATEFORMES filter(instr(WholeSalerID, 'DSC')> 0  ||instr(WholeSalerID, 'TEREVA')> 0) ~> filtreDSC
renameColumns, filtreDSC join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerDSC
PLATEFORMES filter(instr(WholeSalerID, 'DSC')== 0  &&  instr(WholeSalerID, 'TEREVA')== 0) ~> filtreOtherPlateforme
renameColumns, filtreOtherPlateforme join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerPlateforme

		ca_final = toDouble(ca_final)) ~> getCAMonth
getQuantityMonth, getCAMonth join(quantityToLine@{Num Org} == CAtoLine@{Num Org}
	&& quantityToLine@{Num DR} == CAtoLine@{Num DR}
	&& quantityToLine@{Num ATC} == CAtoLine@{Num ATC}
	&& quantityToLine@{Canal Dist} == CAtoLine@{Canal Dist}
	&& quantityToLine@{Nom Canal} == CAtoLine@{Nom Canal}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 1} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 1}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 2} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 2}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 3} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 3}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 4} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 4}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 5} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 5}
	&& getQuantityMonth@Mois == getCAMonth@Mois
	&& quantityToLine@{Qté Obj An} == CAtoLine@{Qté Obj An}
	&& quantityToLine@{CA Obj An} == CAtoLine@{CA Obj An},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinQuantityAndCA

source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		Article as string,
		prix_unitaire as string,
		{Durée_période} as string,
		{Période} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> prixmoyen
splitDuree derive(mois1 = toInteger(split( {Mois début}, "/")[1]),
		annee1 = split( {Mois début}, "/")[2],
		mois2 = toInteger(split( {Mois fin}, "/")[1]),
		annee2 = split( {Mois fin}, "/")[2],
		Distributeur = iif(WholeSalerID=='ancs - accueil négoce chauffage sanitaire','partedis',  iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'trva - tereva' )>0, 'tereva',    iif( (instr(WholeSalerID, 'dsc')>0)  || (instr(WholeSalerID, 'cedeo')>0 ) , 'dsc',     iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'vf' )>0, 'vf_confort',      iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'sonac' )>0, 'sonac',WholeSalerID)))))) ~> splitAnneeMois
splitAnneeMois derive(toreplicate = iif (mois2 - mois1 <=0, 1 ,  mois2 - mois1+1)) ~> createArray
prixmoyen derive({Mois début} = split( {Durée_période} ,"-")[1],
		{Mois fin} = split( {Durée_période} ,"-")[2],
		WholeSalerID = lower(WholeSalerID)) ~> splitDuree
createArray derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(toreplicate)), #index )) ~> createLoop
createLoop foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Distributeur,
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		{Période},
		{Mois début},
		{Mois fin},
		mois1,
		annee1,
		mois2,
		annee2,
		toreplicate,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1

		Article,
		Distributeur,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		{Période},
		{Mois début},
		{Mois fin},
		mois1,
		annee1,
		mois2,
		annee2,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Flatten1 derive(dd = toInteger(dd) -1) ~> DerivedColumn5
Select1 derive(month = dd+mois1) ~> month

source(output(
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{1ereDateLivrDdee} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as integer,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as integer,
		{CA facturé} as double,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturationAC
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> plateforme
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{1ereDateLivrDdee} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as integer,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as integer,
		{CA facturé} as double,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturationAP
cleansing filter({Canal distribution}==42) ~> keep42and51
keep42and51 derive(fact_filter1 = iif( instr(lower({Type de facture}),"yfar")==0 && instr(lower({Motif commande}),"fas")==0, 0, 1),
		fact_filter2 = iif(instr(lower({Type de facture}),"yafb")==0 && instr(lower({Motif commande}),"fas")==0, 0, 1)) ~> factureFilter
facFilter, plateforme join(trim({Récept. de march.}, " ") == trim(HubSAPid, " "),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerPlateforme
innerPlateforme select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommonInner
prixMoyen sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> sort
dropColumns keyGenerate(output(ID as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L) ~> addKey
addKey derive(ID = ID+1) ~> previousID
addKey, renameToPrevious join(ID == {previous ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinPreviousRow
sort derive(prix_unitaire = {CA facturé}/{Qté facturée}) ~> prixUnitaire
dropColumnsInCommonInner aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier}),
	{Qté facturée} = max({Qté facturée}),
		{CA facturé} = max({CA facturé})) ~> prixMoyen
prixUnitaire select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
previousID select(mapColumn(
		{previous WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{previous Article} = Article,
		{previous Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{previous Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{previous prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{previous ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToPrevious
addKey derive(ID = ID-1) ~> nextID
nextID select(mapColumn(
		{next WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{next Article} = Article,
		{next Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{next Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{next prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{next ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToNext
joinPreviousRow, renameToNext join(ID == {next ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNextRow
joinNextRow derive({Changement de période} = iif({previous Article}!=Article || {previous WholeSalerID}!=WholeSalerID || {previous Année civile}!={Année civile}, 
    1, 

    iif(abs(({previous prix_unitaire}-prix_unitaire)/{previous prix_unitaire})>0.1, 1, 0))) ~> changementDePeriode
changementDePeriode filter({Changement de période}==1) ~> changementDePeriodeFiltre
joinNewNextID derive({Durée_période} = iif(WholeSalerID=={previous WholeSalerID} && Article=={previous Article} && {Année civile}=={previous Année civile}
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article} && {Année civile}=={next Année civile}
    
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Année civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Année civile})
        
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile}))
    
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article} && {Année civile}=={next Année civile}
        
        , "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Année civile})
        
        , "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile})))) ~> DureePeriode
UnionFacturation derive({Canal distribution} = toInteger({Canal distribution})) ~> cleansing
DureePeriode sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon1
dropColumnsInCommon1 filter(!isNull(WholeSalerID) || !isNull(Article) || !isNull({Année civile}) || !isNull({Mois calendrier}) || !isNull(prix_unitaire) || !isNull({Durée_période})) ~> dropNULL
facFilter, plateforme join(trim({Récept. de march.}, " ") == trim(HubSAPid, " "),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftPlateforme
leftPlateforme filter(isNull(HubSAPid)) ~> leftOuterPlateforme
leftOuterPlateforme aggregate(groupBy(Article,
		{Année civile}),
	prix_unitaire = mean({CA facturé}/{Qté facturée})) ~> prixUnitaireLeft
prixUnitaireLeft derive({Durée_période} = "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile}),
		join = 1) ~> dureePeriodeLeft
derivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID),
	HubName = max(WholeSalerHubID)) ~> uniqueWholeSalerID
uniqueWholeSalerID select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> drop
drop derive(join = 1) ~> join
dureePeriodeLeft, join join(dureePeriodeLeft@join == join@join,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon
dropNULL select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns2
dropColumnsInCommon derive({Période} = 1) ~> addperiod
dropColumns2, averagePrix union(byName: true)~> Union1
factureFilter filter(fact_filter1==0 || fact_filter2==0) ~> facFilter
Sort2 keyGenerate(output(ID as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L) ~> addNewKey
changementDePeriodeFiltre select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> deletePreviousAndNext
deletePreviousAndNext sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> Sort2
addNewKey derive(ID = ID-1) ~> nextNewID
nextNewID select(mapColumn(
		{next WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{next Article} = Article,
		{next Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{next Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{next ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToNextNew
addNewKey derive(ID = ID+1) ~> previousNewID
previousNewID select(mapColumn(
		{previous WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{previous Article} = Article,
		{previous Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{previous Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{previous ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToPreviousNew
addNewKey, renameToPreviousNew join(ID == {previous ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNewPreviousID
joinNewPreviousID, renameToNextNew join(ID == {next ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNewNextID
addperiod, dropColumns2 join(dropColumnsInCommon@WholeSalerID == dropColumns2@WholeSalerID
	&& dropColumnsInCommon@Article == dropColumns2@Article,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join2
join2 filter(isNull(dropColumns2@WholeSalerID) || isNull(dropColumns2@Article)) ~> leftJoin
leftJoin select(mapColumn(
		Article = dropColumnsInCommon@Article,
		prix_unitaire = dropColumnsInCommon@prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période} = dropColumnsInCommon@{Durée_période},
		WholeSalerID = dropColumnsInCommon@WholeSalerID,
		{Période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> averagePrix
facturationAC, facturationAP union(byName: true)~> UnionFacturation
plateforme derive(WholeSalerID = iif(WholeSalerID=="CDO - CEDEO Distribution Sanitaire Chauffage", "DSC - Distribution Sanitaire Chauffage", WholeSalerID)) ~> derivedColumn1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TEMP_PRIX_PAR_PERIODE.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> dureePeriodeOutput

traitement:
concat all file in vmc,
drop duplicate.
output referentiel VMC.

		VMC as string

	rowUrlColumn: 'filename') ~> inputVMC

extractYEAr aggregate(groupBy(Material,
		year),
	VMC = first(VMC)) ~> Aggregate1

	),

	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> output

		dep_ag as string,
		frs as string,
		article as string,
		article_lib as string,
		dm as string,
		ref_frs as string,
		{vva (m) n} as string,
		{vva (m) n-1} as string,
		{qte (m) n} as string,
		{qte (m) n-1} as string,
		{vva (c) n} as string,
		{vva (c) n-1} as string,
		{qte (c) n} as string,
		{qte (c) n-1} as string,
		{var. vva (m)} as string,
		{var. qte (m)} as string,
		{var. vva (c)} as string,
		{var. qte (c)} as string,
		path as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ECOULEMENT
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		year as string,
		reference as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
derivedColumn2 compose(mapColumn(
		id = idDecrementation,
		PossAMid = POSSAMid,
		reference,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		qte_venteDirecte = {Qté vente direct}
	),
	composition: 'decrementationVenteDirecte') ~> flowlet1@(output1)
rename derive(yearmonth = replace(split(split(path, "/")[3], "_")[1], "-", ""),
		canal = split(split(path, "/")[3], "_")[2],
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonthANDcanal
ConditionalSplit1@qteNotNul derive(year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 5, 2)) ~> yearANDmonth
yearANDmonth filter(!isNull(agence_code)) ~> agenceCodeNotNull
organisation filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posIDNotNull
agenceCodeNotNull, uniqueOrganisation join(agence_code == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
posIDNotNull aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID)) ~> uniqueOrganisation
window1, EndVentesDirectes join(yearANDmonth@year == EndVentesDirectes@year
	&& ConditionalSplit1@qteNotNul@reference == EndVentesDirectes@reference
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
ECOULEMENT select(mapColumn(
		societe,
		region_lib,
		sgeo,
		sgeo_lib,
		agence_code = agence,
		agence_lib,
		dep_ag,
		marque_file = frs,
		article_lib,
		dm,
		reference = ref_frs,
		qte_ecoulement = {qte (m) n},
		path
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> rename
innerOrganisation, EndVentesDirectes join(yearANDmonth@year == EndVentesDirectes@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(ConditionalSplit1@qteNotNul@reference, " ", ""))),replace(ConditionalSplit1@qteNotNul@reference, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(EndVentesDirectes@reference, " ", ""))),replace(EndVentesDirectes@reference, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(EndVentesDirectes@reference) || isNull(EndVentesDirectes@year) || isNull({Code client})) ~> outerLeftVentesDirectes
derivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		societe,
		region_lib,
		qte_ecoulement,
		sgeo,
		sgeo_lib,
		agence_code,
		agence_lib,
		dep_ag,

		dm,
		reference,
		path,

		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon1
outerLeftVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		societe,
		region_lib,
		sgeo,
		sgeo_lib,
		agence_code,
		agence_lib,
		dep_ag,
		marque_file,
		article_lib,
		dm,
		reference = ConditionalSplit1@qteNotNul@reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		path,
		yearmonth,
		canal,
		year = yearANDmonth@year,
		month,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon
dropColumnsInCommon1, dropColumnsInCommon union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion
marquename select(mapColumn(
		distributeur = societe,
		agence_code,
		marque_file,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		canal,
		year,
		month,
		HubSAPid,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		marque_id = BrandID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
fullLeftUnion derive(marque_name = "SaunierDuval",
		marque = "1604",
		marque_num = "1604") ~> marquename
agenceCodeNotNull, uniqueOrganisation join(agence_code == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftOrganisation
fullLeftOrganisation filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> leftOnly
yearmonthANDcanal split(qte_ecoulement!=0,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(qteNotNul, qteNull)
ventesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		year,
		reference,
		{Code client},
		{Qté vente direct} = qte_ecoulement
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EndVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation window(over(year,
		POSSAMid,
		reference),
	asc(month, true),
	qte_cumul = sum(qte_ecoulement)) ~> window1
innerVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		societe,
		region_lib,
		sgeo,
		sgeo_lib,
		agence_code,
		agence_lib,
		dep_ag,
		marque_file,
		article_lib,
		dm,
		reference = ConditionalSplit1@qteNotNul@reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		path,
		yearmonth,
		canal,
		year = yearANDmonth@year,
		month,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID,
		qte_cumul,
		reference = EndVentesDirectes@reference,
		{Code client},
		{Qté vente direct}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
join1 derive(qte_ecoulement = qt_final) ~> derivedColumn1
select1 keyGenerate(output(idDecrementation as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L) ~> idDecrementation
idDecrementation select(mapColumn(
		idDecrementation,
		POSSAMid,
		reference,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		{Qté vente direct}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select2
select2 derive(month = toInteger(month),
		qte_ecoulement = toFloat(qte_ecoulement),
		{Qté vente direct} = toFloat({Qté vente direct})) ~> derivedColumn2
idDecrementation, flowlet1@output1 join(idDecrementation == id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join1
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,

		canal as string,

		code_depot as string,

		marque_code as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		Client as string,
		Marque as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		marque_id as string,
		Offre as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['TEREVA_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TEREVAECOULPREPARED
leftOnly sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,

	),

	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TEREVAORGANISATIONNOTFOUND
ConditionalSplit1@qteNull sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,

properties.description: flux pour le retraitmenet des ecoulements du modele dsc-tereva

		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,

		BrandID as string,

		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> salerDSC
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrgaTerevas
source(output(
		Article as string,
		Distributeur as string,
		prix_unitaire as string,
		{Durée_période} as string,
		{Période} as string,
		{Mois début} as string,
		{Mois fin} as string,
		mois1 as string,
		annee1 as string,
		mois2 as string,
		annee2 as string,
		dd as string,
		month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> prixParPeriode
ecoulement select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal} = {code postal},
		marque_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
avoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		Code_depot,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> filterColumnsToUse
EccAddToReplicate split(in(["dsc",'tereva'],lower(distributeur)),
	disjoint: false) ~> filterDistrubitor@(dscTereva, notDscTereva)
filterColumnsToUse derive(toreplicate = abs( toInteger( Qte_Validee_VGF ) )) ~> AvoirAddToReplicate
dropColumns derive(toreplicate = abs(toInteger( qte_ecoulement )),
		agence_code = replace(agence_code, ".0", "")) ~> EccAddToReplicate
newColumns split(in(["2","7"], CompanyId),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(DscTerevaAvoir, NotDscTerevaAvoir)
salerDSC, OrgaTerevas union(byName: true)~> unionDSCTereva
unionDSCTereva aggregate(groupBy(POSid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		HubSAPid = last(HubSAPid)) ~> uniqueAgenceCode
AvoirAddToReplicate derive(ca_avoir = toFloat(PA_Valide_VGF),
		yearmonth = iif(toInteger(Mois)<10, {Année}+"0"+Mois  ,   {Année}+Mois  ),
		Qte_Validee_VGF = toInteger( Qte_Validee_VGF )) ~> newColumns
ReSelect, uniqueAgenceCode join(Agence == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> DscTerevaJoinOrganisation
ConditionalSplit1@DscTerevaAvoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		toreplicate,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReSelect
DscTerevaJoinOrganisation filter(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF) >0) ~> positiveQuantite
filterDistrubitor@dscTereva derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(qte_ecoulement)), #index),
		rcount = 1) ~> dd
dd foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		dd,
		rcount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> ddToList
ddToList window(over(year,
		agence_code,
		reference),
	asc(year, true),
	asc(agence_code, true),
	asc(reference, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window1
filterDistrubitor@notDscTereva derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(qte_ecoulement)), #index)) ~> dd2
dd2 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		toreplicate,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> dd2ToList
dd2ToList window(over(yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		reference),
	asc(yearmonth, true),
	asc(HubSAPid, true),
	asc(reference, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window2
positiveQuantite derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF)), #index)) ~> dd3
dd3tolist window(over(year = {Année},
		Agence,
		NoArtVGF),
	asc({Année}, true),
	asc(Agence, true),
	asc(NoArtVGF, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window3
dd3 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		{Année},
		Mois_Selection,
		Mois,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		yearmonth,
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_avoir,
		POSid,
		WholeSalerID,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> dd3tolist
Window3 derive(indexcols2 = {Année}+Agence+NoArtVGF+toString(indexcols2),
		qte_avoir = iif(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF) >0, 1, -1 )) ~> indexcols3
Window2 derive(indexcols2 = yearmonth+HubSAPid+coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(reference, " ", ""))),replace(reference, " ", ""))+toString(indexcols2),
		qte_ecc = iif(toInteger(qte_ecoulement) >0, 1, -1 )) ~> indexcols2
dropdd derive(indexcols2 = year+agence_code+reference+toString(indexcols2),
		qte_ecc = iif(toInteger(qte_ecoulement) >0, 1, -1 )) ~> indexcols
filterDistrubitor@notDscTereva filter(lower(distributeur)=="tereva") ~> Filter1
Window1 select(mapColumn(
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		rcount,
		indexcols2,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropdd

properties.description: flux pour le retraitmenet des ecoulements du modele dsc-tereva

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		marque_file as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque_id as string,
		marque as string,
		Client as string,
		{code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		{Clé} as string,
		Marque as string,
		Mois_Selection as string,
		Code_depot as string,
		Depot as string,
		NoFrs as string,
		FOUR2 as string,
		C_Four as string,
		Lib_Four as string,
		Categorie as string,
		Canal as string,
		Financement as string,
		NoOffre as string,
		Date_Debut as string,
		Date_Fin as string,
		NoArtDSC as string,
		LibArt as string,
		NoArtVGF as string,
		Agence as string,
		{LIB AGENCE} as string,
		{Qté_Ini} as string,
		Solde_Qte as string,
		Qte_Tot as string,
		Qte_Retenue as string,
		Qte_Validee_VGF as string,
		NoCli as string,
		NomCli as string,
		PRR as string,
		PRS_ligne_BL as string,
		PA_Ref as string,
		PA_D as string,
		PA_Valide_VGF as string,
		Ecart as string,
		Aide as string,
		Aide_Retenue as string,
		{Aide_Validée_VGF} as string,
		Date_Num as string,
		P_Fact as string,
		{Clé_Offre_Article} as string,
		Motif_Commentaire as string,
		{Qté_Campagne} as string,
		Prix_Campagne as string,
		Mois as string,
		{Année} as string,
		Montant_Avoir as string,
		NoDocRefac as string,
		NoLigneDocRefac as string,
		{Contrôle} as string,
		Date_Ctrl as string,
		Code_Motif_Refus as string,
		CompanyId as string,
		{ValidéPar} as string,
		DateAjout as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> avoir
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> salerDSC
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrgaTerevas
source(output(
		Article as string,
		Distributeur as string,
		prix_unitaire as string,
		{Durée_période} as string,
		{Période} as string,
		{Mois début} as string,
		{Mois fin} as string,
		mois1 as string,
		annee1 as string,
		mois2 as string,
		annee2 as string,
		dd as string,
		month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> prixParPeriode
ecoulement select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal} = {code postal},
		marque_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
avoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		Code_depot,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> filterColumnsToUse
EccAddToReplicate split(in(["dsc",'tereva'],lower(distributeur)),
	disjoint: false) ~> filterDistrubitor@(dscTereva, notDscTereva)
filterColumnsToUse derive(toreplicate = abs( toInteger( Qte_Validee_VGF ) )) ~> AvoirAddToReplicate
dropColumns derive(toreplicate = abs(toInteger( qte_ecoulement )),
		agence_code = replace(agence_code, ".0", "")) ~> EccAddToReplicate
newColumns split(in(["2","7"], CompanyId),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(DscTerevaAvoir, NotDscTerevaAvoir)
salerDSC, OrgaTerevas union(byName: true)~> unionDSCTereva
unionDSCTereva aggregate(groupBy(POSid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		HubSAPid = last(HubSAPid)) ~> uniqueAgenceCode
AvoirAddToReplicate derive(ca_avoir = toFloat(PA_Valide_VGF),
		yearmonth = iif(toInteger(Mois)<10, {Année}+"0"+Mois  ,   {Année}+Mois  ),
		Qte_Validee_VGF = toInteger( Qte_Validee_VGF )) ~> newColumns
ReSelect, uniqueAgenceCode join(Agence == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> DscTerevaJoinOrganisation
ConditionalSplit1@DscTerevaAvoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		toreplicate,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReSelect
DscTerevaJoinOrganisation filter(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF) >0) ~> positiveQuantite
filterDistrubitor@dscTereva derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(qte_ecoulement)), #index),
		rcount = 1) ~> dd
dd foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		dd,
		rcount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> ddToList
ddToList window(over(year,
		agence_code,
		reference),
	asc(year, true),
	asc(agence_code, true),
	asc(reference, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window1
filterDistrubitor@notDscTereva derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(qte_ecoulement)), #index)) ~> dd2
derivedColumn1 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month = filterDistrubitor@notDscTereva@month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur = filterDistrubitor@notDscTereva@distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		toreplicate,
		dd,
		{Période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> dd2ToList
derivedColumn2 window(over(year,
		{Période},
		POSSAMidString,
		ref2),
	asc(yearmonth, true),
	asc(HubSAPid, true),
	asc(reference, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window2
positiveQuantite derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF)), #index)) ~> dd3
dd3tolist window(over(year = {Année},
		Agence,
		NoArtVGF),
	asc({Année}, true),
	asc(Agence, true),
	asc(NoArtVGF, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window3
dd3 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		{Année},
		Mois_Selection,
		Mois,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		yearmonth,
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_avoir,
		POSid,
		WholeSalerID,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> dd3tolist
Window3 derive(indexcols2 = {Année}+Agence+NoArtVGF+toString(indexcols2),
		qte_avoir = iif(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF) >0, 1, -1 )) ~> indexcols3
Window2 derive(indexcols2 = year+"-"+{Période}+"-"+POSSAMidString+"-"+coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(reference, " ", ""))),replace(reference, " ", ""))+"-"+toString(indexcols2),
		qte_ecc = iif(toInteger(qte_ecoulement) <=0, -1, 1 )) ~> indexcols2
dropdd derive(indexcols2 = year+agence_code+reference+toString(indexcols2),
		qte_ecc = iif(toInteger(qte_ecoulement) >0, 1, -1 )) ~> indexcols
filterDistrubitor@notDscTereva filter(lower(distributeur)=="tereva") ~> Filter1
Window1 select(mapColumn(
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		rcount,
		indexcols2,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropdd
indexcols derive(ca_ecoulement = abs(toDouble(ca_ecoulement))*qte_ecc) ~> caEcoulement
indexcols3 derive(ca_avoir = abs(ca_avoir)*qte_avoir) ~> caAvoir
ReSelect, uniqueAgenceCode join(Agence == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOrganisation
JoinOrganisation filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNULL
prixParPeriode derive({Période} = iif(length({Période})>1,{Période},"0"+{Période})) ~> periode
periode select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		Distributeur,
		{Période},
		annee2,
		month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoicePrix
dd2, columnChoicePrix join(replace(lower( iif(filterDistrubitor@notDscTereva@distributeur=="MABILLE", "sonac", filterDistrubitor@notDscTereva@distributeur) ), " ", "") == replace(lower(columnChoicePrix@Distributeur), " ", "")
	&& toInteger(year) == toInteger(annee2)
	&& toInteger(filterDistrubitor@notDscTereva@month) == toInteger(columnChoicePrix@month)

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Clé Référentiel} as string,
		{Recherche Clé EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as integer,
		{Code Postal fin} as integer,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		DR as string,
		{ID SAP} as string,
		{Diffus/Chantier} as string,
		{Plan prime} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> atcJoined
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		{Clé Référentiel},
		{Recherche Clé EPS},
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		ATC = {ID SAP},
		NomATC = Utilisateur,
		{Plan primes} = {Plan prime},
		Matricule = {ID SAP},
		DR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renamle
renamle derive({Canal final} = iif( in(["Vaillant diffus","SD diffus",'Diffus'], {Plan primes}), "Diffus" ,"Chantier" ),
		toreplicate = {Code Postal fin}-{Code Postal début}+1) ~> canalFinal
canalFinal filter({Code Postal début}<= {Code Postal fin}) ~> filtreCodePostal
filtreCodePostal derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(toreplicate)), #index)) ~> dd
dd foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		ATC,
		NomATC = Utilisateur,
		{Plan primes},
		Matricule = ATC,
		{Canal final},
		toreplicate,
		dd,
		DR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 derive(dd = toInteger(dd) -1) ~> dd1
dd1 derive({Code postal} = {Code Postal début}+dd) ~> codePostalUpdate
atcJoined derive({ID SAP} = toInteger({ID SAP})) ~> DerivedColumn1
canalFinal filter(ATC==16400015) ~> Filter1
renamle filter(ATC==16400015) ~> Filter3
codePostalUpdate filter(in(['Attaché commercial prescription','Attaché commercial réseau 2','Attaché commercial réseau' ], Fonction)) ~> Filter4
codePostalUpdate filter(in(['Conseiller Technique Thermodynamique' ,'Conseiller technique régional'], Fonction)) ~> Filter5
Filter5 select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		IDSAP = ATC,
		Nom = NomATC,
		{Plan primes},
		Matricule,
		{Canal final},
		toreplicate,
		dd,
		DR,
		{Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Filter4 filter(!isNull(ATC)) ~> Filter6
Filter6 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['referentiel_atc.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AtcprepareForReplicate
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{SAUNIER DUVAL} as string,
		{208.0} as string,
		{Pièces détachées pour chauffage} as string,
		{05608600} as string,
		{5272.0} as string,
		{33.0} as string,
		{0.0} as string,
		{202008} as string,
		{2020} as string,
		{08} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['referentiel_CTRCTT.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

properties.description:
o	Pour le cout
	Prendre la facturation « brute » en sortie de SAP/BW
	Filtrer les lignes ou le donneur d’ordre est un CTT
•	Question 2bis (cf plus haut) : il semblerait que nous ayons besoin ID du CTT ?
	Filtrer certaines raisons de commandes et de types de document
•	Question 3 : pouvez-vous nous transmettre le détail des filtres svp ?
	La colonne de cout en sortie sera le « cout standard » présent dans la facturation 
	Ajouter l’information de VMC (en euros) en faisant la jointure en avec le nouveau référentiel VMC (info non dispo dans l’extract à date BW)
	Ajouter les méta données produits, client, CTT, comme dans la base commerciale
